text/x-wiki
The '''Prisoners' Carnival''' was [[Luskan]]'s court of justice, although in reality it was just a public spectacle of torture and execution. It was located in the most public part of town: the Market. It also held an arena, where duels to the death were organized by the [[Coin Spinners]].

===Known prisoners===
* [[Wulfgar]]
* [[Morik]]
* [[Tee-a-nicknick]]
* [[Creeps Sharky]]

===Known magistrates===
* [[Jharkheld]]
